DataElement.preferredName: Combined Household Annual Gross Income Household Gross Income Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the combined household yearly income before taxes, exclusions, and deductions.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Made or joined or united into one or involving the joint activity of two or more._A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data._Occurring or done each year._A person's total income before taxes, exclusions, and deductions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Made or joined or united into one or involving the joint activity of two or more.:A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data.

Concepts.definition: Made or joined or united into one or involving the joint activity of two or more.
